mapper.insert: insert into pdt_mst values( 0, #{pdt_name}, #{category_id}, #{pdt_price}, #{pdt_simple_info}, #{pdt_detail_info}, now(), now() )
mapper.select: select pm.id, pm.pdt_name, pm.pdt_price, pcm.category_name, pm_cnt.product_total_count from pdt_mst pm left outer join pdt_category_mst pcm on (pcm.id = pm.category_id) left outer join ( select count(*) product_total_count from pdt_mst ) pm_cnt on (1=1) limit #{page}, 10
select pm.id as pdt_id, pcm.category_name, pm.pdt_name from pdt_mst pm left outer join pdt_category_mst pcm on (pm.category_id = pcm.id)

select psd.id as size_id, psm.size_name from pdt_mst pm left outer join pdt_category_mst pcm on(pcm.id = pm.category_id) left outer join pdt_size_dtl psd on(psd.group_id = pcm.group_id) left outer join pdt_size_mst psm on(psm.id = psd.size_id) where pm.id = #{productId}
